# <code>math min</code> for math

<div class='command-title'>Finds the minimum within a list of numbers or tables</div>

## Signature

```> math min```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Get the minimum of a list of numbers
```shell
  > [-50 100 25] | math min
```
